list.name: Default
list.comment: Fixed the Poisson solver .. unphysical electric field is now correctly subtracted.

list.name: Rejected commit: Default
list.comment: Fixed the nearest-grid-point (NGP) interpolator. It should work correctly now. Using the NGPInterpolator I get good results in the two-particle test, better than CIC actually. There is some elusive bug in the CIC code..

task.summary: Fixed the nearest-grid-point (NGP) interpolator. It should work correctly now. Using the NGPInterpolator I get good results in the two-particle test, better than CIC actually. There is some elusive bug in the CIC code..
Added some options to the ascii phase space output. It can now render the phase space density, the electric field and the charge density.
Fixed the Poisson solver .. unphysical electric field is now correctly subtracted.

MESSAGE.value: Fixed the nearest-grid-point (NGP) interpolator. It should work correctly now. Using the NGPInterpolator I get good results in the two-particle test, better than CIC actually. There is some elusive bug in the CIC code..

Fixed the Poisson solver .. unphysical electric field is now correctly subtracted.
